reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.des:
What I value the most about JORI International is their customer service and on time deadlines.
There are so many other competitors out there who would want our business but there is no way they could give us the service we get with JORI International, so why would we go anywhere else?

about.title: JORI Logistics
about.des: As a family owned and operated company headquartered in Calgary, with offices in Houston, Almaty and Cebu City, JORI is small enough to care and big enough to matter. We combine unparalleled customer service with robust technology solutions to transform logistics into a competitive advantage for importers and exporters. Since 1992 we’ve provided turnkey logistics services, including: Canadian Customs Brokerage, U.S. Customs Brokerage, Air Freight, Ocean Freight, Ground Freight, Trade Consulting and more.
